label: Entity Extraction
definition: Finds and categorizes entities like names, places, and dates.

label: Relationship Extraction
definition: Finds relationships between entities in text.

label: Sentiment Analysis
definition: Identifies the sentiment of the text as positive, negative, or neutral.

label: Document Classification
definition: Assigns categories to a document based on its content.

label: Label Generation
definition: Generates keywords or labels summarizing a document.

label: Summarization
definition: Creates a shorter version of the text while keeping key information.

label: Embedding Generation
definition: Converts text into numerical representations for analysis.

label: Clustering Analysis
definition: Groups similar texts together based on content or structure.

label: Dimensionality Reduction
definition: Reduces the number of features in text data while keeping important patterns.

label: Data Transformation
definition: Converts text into a different format for analysis or modeling.

label: Machine Translation
definition: Translates text from one language to another.

label: Question Answering
definition: Finds answers to questions based on a given text.

label: Natural Language Inference
definition: Determines the relationship between two pieces of text, such as entailment or contradiction.

label: Segmentation
definition: Splits text into meaningful parts like sentences, paragraphs, or topics.
